comments:
This has been tested on both Windows XP and GTK+.  Eclipse will fail to start 
with the following exception.  (A slightly different trace will appear if you 
are set up to prompt for which workspace to use.)

This was due to a coding error fixing a compiler warning. Fix is released to 
HEAD.

These bugs were modified after M1 had shipped.  I'm attaching them to the 3.1 
M2 milestone so that they are picked up for the test pass.  If they were fixed 
earlier, please feel free to remove the target milestone.
